title: Who dares wins: men of the Special Air Service Regiment
brief_description: The title of this film is the motto of the Special Air Service Regiment, or SAS as it is commonly known. These men of the Australian Army possess specialist skills which are utilised, together with further training, to mould an elite fighting force. Shows their primary role in reconnaissance, surveillance and harassment of an enemy.
